LanguageData.BEWH.PsychicPhenomena: Enabling this will make psykers who are experiencing mental breakdowns create a psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsykerPariahBirth: Enabling this will allow children to be rarely and randomly born as psykers and pariahs.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsykerPariahBirthChance: Chance that newly born children will either be a psyker or pariah: {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.Annihilation: A psychic blast surged through {0} and into the world, causing a warp explosion completely annihilating {0} and severely damaging everything around them.
LanguageData.BEWH.DaemonHost: A strong link was established between {0} and one of the chaos gods, allowing them to send in some daemons.
LanguageData.BEWH.UncontrollablePowers: In a temporary loss of control over their powers, {0} caused a warp explosion, causing damage to everyone near them.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsychicComa: Overwhelmed by the warp made {0} fall into a psychic coma.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsychicConnectionSevered: In an instant {0} no longer felt any connection to the warp, as if completely cut off.
LanguageData.BEWH.BloodRain: As if a cruel joke, blood suddenly starts raining.
LanguageData.BEWH.PlantRot: All plant life seems to rot in {0} presence, leaving it lifeless.
LanguageData.BEWH.NaturalBornXMessage: From the moment {0} became pregnant something felt off, something that has finally come to light. It seems that {1} has been born as a natural {2}.
LanguageData.BEWH.SelectMatrixDesc: Select matrix to gestate from among your matrices
LanguageData.BEWH.MissingGestateResearch: You have not researched any gestatable genetic matrices projects
LanguageData.BEWH.EjectGeneMatrixDesc: Ejects {0} from the gene gestator, allowing you to insert another
LanguageData.BEWH.StartGeneGestatingDesc: Starts the gestating process, once started it cannot be stopped
LanguageData.BEWH.GestateFinishMessage: {0} has been gestated into {1} and can now be implanted into a suitable pawn
LanguageData.BEWH.SelectXMaterialDesc: Select {0} material from among your available materials, if you have any
LanguageData.BEWH.ImplantGeneseedDesc: You are about to implant {0}, making them into a {1}
LanguageData.BEWH.OutsideOptimalAgeRange: {0} being outside the optimal age range {1}~{2} for this procedure
LanguageData.BEWH.CurrentFailureChance: Current failure chance is {0}%, failure will result in death and loss of geneseed vial
LanguageData.BEWH.FailureChanceCausedBy: Current failure chance is caused by:
LanguageData.BEWH.FailureChanceCapped: Procedure failure chance was capped at {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.AlreadySuperHuman: {0} is already a superhuman and cannot be enhanced again
LanguageData.BEWH.OrderImplantGeneseedDesc: Implant this geneseed into a person to partially override their genetic code.\n\nThis is a surgical operation, so it requires a doctor, medical bed and {MEDICINEAMOUNT} medicine.
LanguageData.BEWH.LetterGeneseedOrderedImplanted: You have ordered a geneseed be implanted in {PAWN_nameDef}. This procedure requires a medical bed and {MEDICINENEEDED} medicine.{BEDINFO}{MEDICINEINFO}\n\nYou can cancel this procedure by going to {PAWN_nameDef}'s health -> operations tab.
LanguageData.BEWH.GeneseedOrderedImplantedBedNeeded: \n\nYou do not have any medical beds available for {PAWN_nameDef}. Consider marking a bed as medical.
LanguageData.BEWH.GeneseedOrderedImplantedMedicineNee: \n\nYou do not have enough medicine to implant the geneseed. Implanting cannot begin until you get {MEDICINENEEDED} medicine.
LanguageData.BEWH.LivingSaintMessage: In {0}'s final moments they felt a surge of energy surging through them, invigorating and strengthening them. {0} was born anew as a living saint, stronger, faster and evermore loyal.
LanguageData.BEWH.LivingSaintReturnMessage: Though thought dead, {0}'s miracles keeps coming. It seem {0} sensed our situation from their afterlife and manifested themselves to help
LanguageData.BEWH.NoProgenoidGlands: Does not have any progenoid glands
LanguageData.BEWH.SMGeneseedExtractionNotResearched: Space Marine geneseed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.PMGeneseedExtractionNotResearched: Primaris Marine geneseed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.NotEnoughPsyfocus: {0} does not have enough psyfocus to craft
LanguageData.BEWH.DeniedWitch: {0} psychic powers have been severed (Deny the Witch)
